name: Ghost Network
description: Underground contact specializing in engines and turbos. Former racer, extremely careful.

description.heading: Unknown

description.description: Ghost knows your name. He's starting to trust you.

description.heading: Trusted
description.description: Ghost shares his best contacts. You've proven yourself.

description.description: You're family now. Ghost trusts you completely.
